columns.name: ACCOUNTING_EVENT_ID
columns.desc: Identifier for the accounting event associated with this payment; used for linking to SLA and GL.

columns.name: ACCOUNTING_DATE
columns.desc: GL accounting date of the payment; determines the financial period for posting.

columns.name: ACCRUAL_POSTED_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if the payment has been posted to the accrual set of books ('Y' or 'N').

columns.name: AMOUNT
columns.desc: Payment amount applied to the invoice, expressed in the invoice currency.

columns.name: CASH_POSTED_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if the payment has been posted to the cash set of books ('Y' or 'N').

columns.name: CHECK_ID
columns.desc: Identifier linking to the payment instrument (FK to AP_CHECKS_ALL).

columns.name: INVOICE_ID
columns.desc: Foreign key referencing AP_INVOICES_ALL; identifies the invoice being paid.

columns.name: INVOICE_PAYMENT_ID
columns.desc: Primary key; unique identifier for the invoice payment record.

columns.name: LAST_UPDATED_BY
columns.desc: Standard WHO column; user ID who last updated this record (FK to FND_USER.USER_ID).

columns.name: LAST_UPDATE_DATE
columns.desc: Standard WHO column; date when this record was last updated.
